why oh why do you keep comoplaining about cropping when the only thing that is cropped off are the black bars that CN add to the video in order to air a 16:9 HD AR video on their 4:3 SD AR channel? what is the logical reason for keeping 30 pixels of blank screen above and below the actual picture? the only thing you are losing is part of the CN logo, is it so imprtant to you that you would rather we reduce the overall quality of the encode just to include those black bars and complete the CN logo?
 what is the possible advantage of including empty spaces above and below the video?
 To include the black bars would reduce the amount of the overall bitrate that can be dedicated to the actual picture and so reduce the quality of that picture. 
Please make up your minds, do you want us to try to provide the best possible quality video or do you want us to reduce the video quality in order to include empty screen? 
I am going to ask the encoder, for 1 week only, if he will encode these shows without cropping just to prove to everyone how pointless it is to keep big black bars top and bottom of the picture and reducing the overall quality just to include them
